attributes.title: 2015 Nissan NP300 2.5 TDi LWB 4x4 Single-Cab

attributes.description:
BORN TO BE WILD - The Build for Tough 2018 Ford Ranger 3.2 TDCI Wildtrak 4x4 A/T P/U D/C has arrived. This is one not to be missed. Although it is a bakkie, it handles so smoothly and is very comfortable for any long journey ahead. This vehicle can be used as a family vehicle as well as a workhorse. With many great features such as 12 Volt Power Outlet, Dual Front Airbags, Anti-Lock Braking, Air Conditioning, Adjustable Driver Seat - Manual, Alarm System/Remote, 
Antenna - Roof-Mounted Bee-Sting Type, Aux/USB Input Socket, Brake Assist, Body Coloured Front Bumper, Bucket Front Seats, Cruise Control, Cup Holders - Front Seats, Central Locking Remote Control, Dynamic Stability Control, Hill Descent Control, MP3 Compatible Audio/CD Player, Power Steering, Traction Control System, etc just to name a few. With a full Dekra condition and roadworthy report. Price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.
